owl:Ontology.dc:description: This ontology extends the SAREF ontology for the Agricultural domain. This work has been developed in the context of the STF 534 (https://portal.etsi.org/STF/STFs/STFHomePages/STF534.aspx), which was established with the goal to create three SAREF extensions, one of them for the Agricultural domain.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: SAREF extension for Agriculture
owl:Ontology.terms:description: SAREF4AGRI is an extension of SAREF for the agriculture and food domain. SAREF4AGRI is specified and published by ETSI in the TS 103 410-6 associated to this ontology file. The list of use cases, standards and requirements that guided the creation of SAREF4AGRI are described in the associated ETSI TR 103 511.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: SAREF4AGRI: an extension of SAREF for the for the agriculture and food domain

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 altitude of a SpatialThing (decimal meters above the local reference ellipsoid).
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: altitude

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 latitude of a SpatialThing (decimal degrees).
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: latitude

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 longitude of a SpatialThing (decimal degrees).
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: longitude

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A spatial representation for a given feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has geometry

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*****FF*
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially within the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*F**F***
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: within

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a platform and the systems it hosts.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: host

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a system and its hosting platform.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is hosted by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a deployment and the platform(s) involved in the deployment.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deployed on platform

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a deployment and the system deployed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deployed system

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a platform and the deployment(s) that takes place in the platform.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: in deployment

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to represent the yield generated by a Crop.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: generates

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation to indicate the temporal duration or period of a deployment.
has deployment period
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has deployment period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the unique identifier of an animal.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has id

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to represent the members of an AnimalGroup.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has member

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation to indicate the geographical componet of a deployment.
is deployed at space
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is deployed at space

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the physical location of a saref4agri entity (e.g., an animal)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is located in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express that an animal can be part of groups.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is member of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to represent the intake/consumption of certain substances in a Crop.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: receives

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a certain entity (e.g., a device) and the task it accomplishes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: accomplishes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a command and a state
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: acts upon

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between an entity (such as a function) and a command
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has command

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a measurement and the feature of interest being measured.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has feature of interest

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the type of function of a device
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has function

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a feature of interest and its properties.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship indentifying the task accomplished by a certain entity (e.g., a device)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is accomplished by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a command and a function.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is command of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation betwwen a feature of interest and the measurments that are about it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is feature of interest of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a property and a feature of interest in which such property appears.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is property of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a measurement and the device that made it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: measurement made by

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the birth date of an animal.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has birth date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the death date of an animal.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has death date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the day the crop is harvested.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has harvest date
A relation to express the name of an entity (e.g.,animal).
has name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation to express the day the crop is planted.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has plant date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship providing a description of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has manufacturer

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometry

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class spatial-object represents everything that can have a spatial representation. It is superclass of feature and geometry.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SpatialObject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
Uniquely identified by lat/long/alt. i.e.
spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2) :- lat(P1, LAT), long(P1, LONG), alt(P1, ALT), lat(P2, LAT), long(P2, LONG), alt(P2, ALT).
sameThing(P1, P2) :- type(P1, Point), type(P2, Point), spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2).
A point, typically described using a coordinate system relative to Earth, such as WGS84.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Instant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with an extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal interval or instant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Platform is an entity that hosts other entities, particularly Sensors, Actuators, Samplers, and other Platforms (definition taken from http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/Platform)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Platform

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System is a unit of abstraction for pieces of infrastructure that implement Procedures. A System may have components, its subsystems, which are other Systems. (Definition taken from http://www.w3.org/ns/ssn/System)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An individual and identifiable living organism that feeds on organic matter, typically having specialized sense organs and nervous system and able to respond rapidly to stimuli.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Animal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of one or multiple animals.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Animal Group

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A building represents a structure that provides shelter for its occupants or contents and stands in one place. The building is also used to provide a basic element within the spatial structure hierarchy for the components of a building project (together with site, storey, and space).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Building

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An entity used to define the physical spaces of the building. A building space contains devices or building objects.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Building space

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of cultivated plants that is grown on a large scale commercially, especially a cereal, fruit, or vegetable.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Deployment
The scenario, including temporal and spatial information, in which the systems and devices are installed.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Deployment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A plot of land used for the scope of farming which can contain buildings and parcels.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Farm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A class to decsribe a saref4agri farm holding as subcass of an org:Organization
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Farm holding

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A class to decsribe a saref4agri farmer as subcass of a foaf:Person
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Farmer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An area of land, which might be used for grazing animals or planting crops. The parcel is defined as an undividable logical area of land which contains homogeneous items.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parcel

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measures the rain fall.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pluviometer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Upper layer of the earth in which plants grow.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measures the soil moisture.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil tensiometer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An actuator to irrigate an space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Watering gun

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor o system that measure weather conditions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Weather station

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A directive that a device must support to perform a certain function. A command may act upon a state, but does not necessarily act upon a state. For example, the ON command acts upon the ON/OFF state, but the GET command does not act upon any state, it simply gives a directive to retrieve a certain value. We propose here a list of commands that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Command

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The functionality necessary to accomplish the task for which a Device is designed. A device can be designed to perform more than one function. Functions can be structured in categories (subclasses) that reflect different points of view, for example, considering the specific application area for which a function can be used (e.g., light, temperature, motion, heat, power, etc.), or the capability that a function can support (e.g., receive, reply, notify, etc.), and so forth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Function

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A saref:Property related to some measurements that are characterized by a certain value that is measured in a humidity unit
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Humidiy
Humidity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the measured value made over a property. It is also linked to the unit of measure in which the value is expressed and the timestamp of the measurement.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Measurement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An aspect of an entity that can be observable by a sensor.

Anything that can be sensed, measured or controlled in households, common public buildings or offices. We propose here a list of properties that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property
Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The state in which a device can be found, e.g, ON/OFF/STANDBY, or ONLINE/OFFLINE. We propose here a list of states that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: State

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The goal for which a device is designed (from a user perspective). For example, a washing machine is designed for the task of washing. We propose here a list of tasks that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Task

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A saref:Property related to some measurements that are characterized by a certain value that is measured in a temperature unit (degree_Celsius, degree_Fahrenheit, or degree_kelvin)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temperature
Temperature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A saref:Property that allows to specify the time concept in terms of instants or intervals according to the imported W3C Time ontology.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of the Smart Appliances ontology, but this list can be extended.

The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended, also using some other ontologies rather than the Ontology of units of Measure (OM).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unit of measure

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The degree or intensity of heat present in the air.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Air temperature

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The amount of water vapour in the air.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Ambient huidity
Ambient humidity

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The amount of water falling in the soil by irrigation methods.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Irrigation water

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The level or stage of growth of the plant.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Plant growth stage

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The amount of water falling in the soil by natural process (e.g. rain).
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Precipitation

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The amount of water or humidity contained in the soil.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The degree or intensity of heat present in the soil.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil temperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The relation between something and the point, or other geometrical thing in space, where it is. For example, the realtionship between a radio tower and a Point with a given lat and long. Or a relationship between a park and its outline as a closed arc of points, or a road and its location as a arc (a sequence of points). Clearly in practice there will be limit to the accuracy of any such statement, but one would expect an accuracy appropriate for the size of the object and uses such as mapping .
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The amount of food or other substance taken into the body of an animal or into the soil.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Intake

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The produced amount of food for animals or of agricultural products.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Yield
